message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'm offering you 40% upfront. A bird in the hand is worth two in the bush, especially with inflation!
I'll give you 40, which is more than you'll get if we keep going, considering inflation.
Don't be hasty, Bob. This offer is better than what you'll get if you wait any longer. Time is money, especially with this inflation!
Considering the inflation, 35 is a generous offer. You won't get a better deal if we keep going.
Bob, let's stop wasting time. I'm offering a 50/50 split.  Take it before inflation eats away at your potential gains too!
Given the significant impact of inflation on your potential gains, 30 is a more than fair offer at this point. It's better for you to take this now rather than risk further devaluation.
